TopicTitle: Need a little help with some support issues.

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, I'm stuck on some support issues that aren't directly related to KSP, so I'm hoping someone here can pitch in.

Voodoomancer can't get his Aspire to use the Nvidia card with KSP, or with dxdiag, only the Intel graphics which KSP can't use.

Krakenfour can't get process minimizer applications to work with KSP, and is looking for conformation that the issue is or is not local to his/her machine.

If you can help it'd be appreciated.
